Uses of Package
ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices

  • Packages that use ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices 
    Package Description
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi
    Main application logic
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices
    Input Devices (Sensors) and Output Devices
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.imu
    A Inertial measurement unit (IMU) measures and reports a body's specific force, angular rate, and sometimes the orientation of the body, using a combination of accelerometers, gyroscopes, and magnetometers.
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.integration
    Additional Functionality which integrates with external systems
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes
    Implementation of different Flight Modes
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.navigation
    Automatic navigation with the help of gps
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tests
    Unit tests
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tuning
    Automatic PID Tunining

    IOutDevice
